name: PCB Temperature Sensor
desc: Designed a PCB for a temperature sensor using KiCad. The project involves creating a schematic, placing components, and routing traces.

name: Mechanical CAD Gear Mechanism
desc: Created a 3D model of a gear mechanism using SolidWorks. The project includes assembly design and motion simulation to demonstrate gear interactions.

name: CCNA Network Configuration
desc: Configured a small network with routers and switches using Cisco Packet Tracer. Implemented VLANs, routing protocols, and security measures.

name: PCB LED Blinker
desc: Designed a simple PCB for an LED blinker circuit using Eagle. The project involves basic component placement and routing for a functional LED blinker.

name: Mechanical CAD Bracket Design
desc: Developed a 3D model of a mechanical bracket using AutoCAD. The project includes detailed dimensioning and annotations for manufacturing.

name: CCNA Routing and Switching Lab
desc: Created a comprehensive CCNA lab with multiple routers and switches. Implemented static and dynamic routing protocols for hands-on practice.
